resources.string: The word has been added to favorites

Simple offline Slovak - Greek dictionary. Contains almost 29,000 words and phrases. To search words in Greek, you need to add a Greek keyboard in your phone settings.
 		The dictionary contains a simple matching game and a widget displaying random words.
 		The settings allow: 
 - choose a dark or light theme 
 - font size 
 - search method 
 - search without punctuation 
 - view member 
 - display part of speech 
 - allow speech 
 - choose the language of notes and part of speech 
 - choose speech language 
 		Long tap on word add word to favorites. 
 		Application support text-to-speech. Enable speech in settings and click the word.
 		When converting speech to text, you must enable the application to access the microphone.

Abbreviations and expressions in the dictionary.


 	 In Slovak language: 

 CITOSLOV. - interjection 
 ČASTICA - particle 
 ČÍSL. - numeral 
 PO. M. MUŽ. - masculine noun 
 PO. M. MUŽ. MN. - masculine noun plural 
 PO. M. MUŽ. NESKL. - masculine noun indeclinable 
 PO. M. STR. - neuter noun 
 PO. M. STR. MN. - neuter noun plural 
 PO. M. STR. NESKL. - neuter noun indeclinable 
 PO. M. ŽEN. - female noun 
 PO. M. ŽEN. MN. - female noun plural 
 PO. M. ŽEN. NESKL. - female noun indeclinable 
 PREDL. - preposition 
 PRÍD. M. - adjective 
 PRÍD. M. MN. - adjective plural 
 PRÍD. M. NESKL. - adjective indeclinable 
 PRÍSL. - adverb 
 ROZKAZ. - imperative 
 SKRATKA - abbreviation 
 SLOV. - verb 
 SLOV. MIN. ČAS - verb past tense 
 SLOV. MIN. PAS. HL. - verb past passive voice 
 SLOV. PAS. HL. - verb passive voice 
 SLOV. PRÍČ. - verb participle 
 SPOJKA - conjunction 
 ZÁM. - pronoun 
 ZDROB. - diminutive 


words and abbreviations in declension.


ενεργητική - active voice
 παθητική - passive voice
 ενικός - singular č.
 πληθυντικός - plural
 ενεστώτας - present time
 αόριστος - past time
 μέλλοντας - future time
 προστακτική - imperative
 ονομ. - nominative
 γεν. - genitive
 αιτ. - accusative
 αρσενικό - masculine
 θηλυκό - feminine
 ουδέτερο - neuter
Language of notes and word class
